#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int n;
vector<int> a;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while (t--){
        a.clear();
        cin>>n;
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
            int x;
            cin>>x;
            a.push_back(x);
        }
        sort(a.begin(),a.end());
        for (int i=0,j=n-1; i<=j ; i++,j--){
            if (i!=j) cout<<a[i]<<" "<<a[j]<<" ";
            else cout<<a[i]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
